item.description:
So this meetup will be a little different than your average Indie Rock Boston one. I love going to music festivals, and the more the merrier in my opinion! The Osheaga festival is the closest big Indie fest to us now that it looks like All Points West is defunk and the lineup this year is amazing.

For $120 you get:

Arcade Fire
Weezer
Pavement
Metric
The National
Devo
Keane
Stars
Beach House
Edward Sharpe & The Magnetic Zeros
Cage the Elephane
The Morning Benders
and more....


It's around a 5 hour trip (I've done it before). If we car pool and split hotels or stay in a hostel it shouldn't be too costly.

We can figure out the details closer to the date. I'm just trying to see if anyone would be interested.
item.name: Osheaga Festival
